short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en_GB,es,es_4: Explaining or clarify a term with google dictionary. Get meaning from vocabulary in popup on screen. Easy and handy google…
short.en,en_AU,en_US: Explaining or clarify a term with google dictionary. Get meaning from vocabulary in popup. Easy and handy google dictionary.

long.ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,el,et,fa,fi,fil,gu,he,hi,:
Welcome To the Exegetical Dictionary page!

Any of us couldn't remember the meaning of all words. Google Dictionary app made to resolve this problem. 
Dictionary extension allows you to quickly lookup definitions of words and phrases in a clean inline box. Dictionary shows a short description of the word in a popup, button is also provided for comprehensive description via Google Dictionary (by Google)

It is not A Google Translator, imTranslator, Select to Translate or others, it is a convenient extension to learn new words.

Using Dictionary similar to Google Dictionary (by Google )Hold a modifier key (Alt on Windows, Command on Mac, Ctrl on Linux) and double-click or select any word to look it up - an inline box will open to the dictionary entry of that word, usually including examples, audio pronunciation, and synonyms.

Our Dictionary extension is an absolutely free chrome addon. Dictionary extension requires only the necessary permission range for proper work.

Among all features you'll get:
1) Double-click any word to view its definition in a small pop-up bubble.
2) View the complete definition of any word or phrase using the toolbar dictionary.
3) Store a history of words you've looked up, so you can practice them later.
Foreign words are automatically translated to your language of choice.

Supported dictionaries:
- English
- French
- German
- Spanish

Exegetical Dictionary works on all websites, it is faster easier, and lighter than competitors, like google dictionary.

NOTES:

1. After installing, pages already open will not work for looking up - just refresh them and it'll be solved.
2. The Chrome Extensions Gallery pages don't allow lookup (or any on-page extensions) for security reasons.
3. This extension does add a toolbar icon. Do not forget to Pin it.

long.da,no:
Velkommen til siden Eksegetisk ordbok!

Noen av oss kunne ikke huske betydningen av alle ord, ordbok-appen ble laget for å være på vei til å løse dette problemet.
Ordlisteutvidelse lar deg raskt slå opp definisjoner av ord og setninger i en ren innebygd rute. Ordbok viser en kort beskrivelse av ordet i en popup, knappen er også gitt for omfattende beskrivelse via Google Dictionary (av Google)

Bruke ordbok som ligner på Google Dictionary (av Google) Hold inne en endringstast (Alt på Windows, Command på Mac, Ctrl på Linux) og dobbeltklikk eller velg et ord for å slå det opp - en innebygd rute åpnes for ordbokoppføringen til det ordet, vanligvis inkludert eksempler, lyduttale og synonymer.

Vår ordbokutvidelse er et helt gratis kromtillegg. Ordbokutvidelse krever bare det nødvendige tillatelsesområdet for riktig arbeid.

Blant alle funksjonene får du:
1) Dobbeltklikk på et ord for å se definisjonen i en liten popup-boble.
2) Se den komplette definisjonen av ethvert ord eller uttrykk ved hjelp av verktøylinjelisten.
3) Lagre en historie med ord du har slått opp, slik at du kan øve på dem senere.
Utenlandske ord blir automatisk oversatt til ditt valgte språk.

Støttede ordbøker:
- Engelsk
- Fransk
- Tysk
- Spansk

Exegetical Dictionary fungerer på alle nettsteder, det er raskere enklere og lettere enn konkurrenter, som google ordbok.

MERKNADER:

1. Etter installasjon fungerer ikke sider som allerede er åpne for å slå opp - bare oppdater dem, så blir det løst.
2. Siden Chrome Extensions Gallery tillater ikke oppslag (eller andre utvidelser på siden) av sikkerhetsmessige årsaker.
3. Denne utvidelsen legger til et verktøylinjeikon. Ikke glem å feste den.

Any of us couldn't remember the meaning of all words. Google Dictionary app made to resolve this problem. 
Dictionary extension allows you to quickly lookup definitions of words and phrases in a clean inline box. Dictionary shows a short description of the word in a popup, button is also provided for comprehensive description via Google Dictionary (by Google)

It is not A Google Translator, imTranslator, Select to Translate or others, it is a convenient extension to learn new words.

Using Dictionary similar to Google Dictionary (by Google )Hold a modifier key (Alt on Windows, Command on Mac, Ctrl on Linux) and double-click or select any word to look it up - an inline box will open to the dictionary entry of that word, usually including examples, audio pronunciation, and synonyms.

long.de:
Willkommen auf der Seite Exegetical Dictionary!

Jeder von uns konnte sich nicht an die Bedeutung aller Wörter erinnern. Die Dictionary-App wurde entwickelt, um dieses Problem zu lösen.
Mit der Wörterbucherweiterung können Sie schnell Definitionen von Wörtern und Phrasen in einem sauberen Inline-Feld nachschlagen. Das Wörterbuch zeigt eine kurze Beschreibung des Wortes in einem Popup. Die Schaltfläche bietet auch eine umfassende Beschreibung über das Google Wörterbuch (von Google).

Verwenden eines Wörterbuchs ähnlich wie Google Dictionary (von Google) Halten Sie eine Modifizierertaste (Alt unter Windows, Befehl unter Mac, Strg unter Linux) gedrückt und doppelklicken Sie oder wählen Sie ein beliebiges Wort aus, um es nachzuschlagen. Ein Inline-Feld wird zum Wörterbucheintrag von geöffnet dieses Wort, normalerweise mit Beispielen, Audio-Aussprache und Synonymen.

Unsere Dictionary-Erweiterung ist ein absolut kostenloses Chrome-Addon. Die Wörterbucherweiterung erfordert nur den erforderlichen Berechtigungsbereich für die ordnungsgemäße Arbeit.

Unter allen Funktionen erhalten Sie:
1) Doppelklicken Sie auf ein Wort, um dessen Definition in einer kleinen Popup-Blase anzuzeigen.
2) Zeigen Sie die vollständige Definition eines Wortes oder einer Phrase mit dem Symbolleistenwörterbuch an.
3) Speichern Sie eine Historie von Wörtern, die Sie nachgeschlagen haben, damit Sie sie später üben können.
Fremdwörter werden automatisch in die Sprache Ihrer Wahl übersetzt.

Unterstützte Wörterbücher:
- Englisch
- Französisch
- Deutsche
- Spanisch

Exegetical Dictionary funktioniert auf allen Websites, ist schneller, einfacher und leichter als Mitbewerber wie Google Dictionary.

ANMERKUNGEN:

1. Nach der Installation funktionieren bereits geöffnete Seiten nicht mehr zum Nachschlagen. Aktualisieren Sie sie einfach und es wird behoben.
2. Die Seiten der Chrome-Erweiterungsgalerie erlauben aus Sicherheitsgründen keine Suche (oder keine On-Page-Erweiterungen).
3. Diese Erweiterung fügt ein Symbolleistensymbol hinzu. Vergessen Sie nicht, es zu pinnen.

long.en,en_AU,en_US:
Welcome To the Exegetical Dictionary page or Dictionary all Over as I call it!

Any of us couldn't remember the meaning of all words. Google Dictionary app made to resolve this problem. 
Dictionary extension allows you to quickly lookup definitions of words and phrases in a clean inline box. Dictionary shows a short description of the word in a popup, button is also provided for comprehensive description via Google Dictionary (by Google)

It is not A Google Translator, imTranslator, Select to Translate or others, it is a convenient extension to learn new words.

This extension returns synonyms, antonyms, and a definition for a given word. Users can either highlight text on a web page, input words directly into the search form. No need to open a new tab to search for synonyms or related words, just use Synonym.

Synonyms on term selection - simply select any word on any page and Voila! You have great synonyms with a definition right there! In case of editable field when you write - get the list of synonyms and use them.

Using Dictionary similar to Google Dictionary (by Google )Hold a modifier key (Alt on Windows, Command on Mac, Ctrl on Linux) and double-click or select any word to look it up - an inline box will open to the dictionary entry of that word, usually including examples, audio pronunciation, and synonyms.

Our Dictionary extension is an absolutely free chrome addon. Dictionary extension requires only the necessary permission range for proper work.

Among all features you'll get:
1) Double-click any word to view its definition in a small pop-up bubble.
2) View the complete definition of any word or phrase using the toolbar dictionary.
3) Store a history of words you've looked up, so you can practice them later.
Foreign words are automatically translated to your language of choice.

Supported dictionaries:
- English
- French
- German
- Spanish

Exegetical Dictionary works on all websites, it is faster easier, and lighter than competitors, like google dictionary.

Rich dictionary database, and delightful user experience. Perfect tool for writers and bloggers. 

NOTES:

1. After installing, pages already open will not work for looking up - just refresh them and it'll be solved.
2. The Chrome Extensions Gallery pages don't allow lookup (or any on-page extensions) for security reasons.
3. This extension does add a toolbar icon. Do not forget to Pin it.


Dictionary cooperates with Natutti LTD
By installing our extension you agree to our internal Privacy Policy and also automatically agree to the Privacy Policy and Terms of Use of the Natutti platform
https://natutti.net/privacy-policy.html
https://natutti.net/terms-of-use.html

long.es,es_419:
¡Bienvenido a la página del Diccionario Exegético!

Ninguno de nosotros podía recordar el significado de todas las palabras, la aplicación Diccionario fue creada para permanecer en el camino de resolver este problema.
La extensión del diccionario le permite buscar rápidamente definiciones de palabras y frases en un cuadro en línea limpio. El diccionario muestra una breve descripción de la palabra en una ventana emergente, también se proporciona un botón para una descripción completa a través del Diccionario de Google (por Google)

Uso de Diccionario similar al Diccionario de Google (de Google) Mantenga presionada una tecla modificadora (Alt en Windows, Comando en Mac, Ctrl en Linux) y haga doble clic o seleccione cualquier palabra para buscarla: se abrirá un cuadro en línea para la entrada del diccionario de esa palabra, generalmente incluye ejemplos, pronunciación de audio y sinónimos.

Nuestra extensión Diccionario es un complemento de Chrome absolutamente gratuito. La extensión del diccionario requiere solo el rango de permisos necesario para un trabajo adecuado.

Entre todas las funciones, obtendrás:
1) Haga doble clic en cualquier palabra para ver su definición en una pequeña burbuja emergente.
2) Vea la definición completa de cualquier palabra o frase usando el diccionario de la barra de herramientas.
3) Guarde un historial de palabras que ha buscado, para que pueda practicarlas más tarde.
Las palabras extranjeras se traducen automáticamente al idioma que elija.

Diccionarios compatibles:
- Inglés
- francés
- alemán
- Español

Exegetical Dictionary funciona en todos los sitios web, es más rápido, más fácil y más ligero que la competencia, como el diccionario de Google.

NOTAS:

1. Después de la instalación, las páginas que ya están abiertas no funcionarán para buscarlas; simplemente actualícelas y se resolverá.
2. Las páginas de la Galería de extensiones de Chrome no permiten búsquedas (ni extensiones en la página) por razones de seguridad.
3. Esta extensión agrega un icono de barra de herramientas. No te olvides de fijarlo.

Our Dictionary extension is an absolutely free chrome addon. Dictionary extension requires only the necessary permission range for proper work.

2. The Chrome Extensions Gallery pages don't allow lookup (or any on-page extensions) for security reasons.
3. This extension does add a toolbar icon. Do not forget to Pin it.
long.fr:
Bienvenue sur la page du dictionnaire exégétique!

Aucun de nous ne pouvait se souvenir de la signification de tous les mots, l'application Dictionary est conçue pour rester sur la bonne voie pour résoudre ce problème.
L'extension de dictionnaire vous permet de rechercher rapidement des définitions de mots et de phrases dans une boîte en ligne propre. Le dictionnaire affiche une brève description du mot dans une fenêtre contextuelle, le bouton est également fourni pour une description complète via Google Dictionary (par Google)

Utilisation d'un dictionnaire similaire à Google Dictionary (par Google) Maintenez une touche de modification (Alt sous Windows, Commande sur Mac, Ctrl sous Linux) et double-cliquez ou sélectionnez un mot pour le rechercher - une boîte en ligne s'ouvrira à l'entrée du dictionnaire de ce mot, comprenant généralement des exemples, une prononciation audio et des synonymes.

Notre extension Dictionary est un addon chrome absolument gratuit. L'extension de dictionnaire ne nécessite que la plage d'autorisations nécessaire pour un travail correct.

Parmi toutes les fonctionnalités, vous obtiendrez:
1) Double-cliquez sur n'importe quel mot pour afficher sa définition dans une petite bulle contextuelle.
2) Affichez la définition complète de tout mot ou phrase à l'aide du dictionnaire de la barre d'outils.
3) Stockez un historique des mots que vous avez recherchés afin de pouvoir les pratiquer plus tard.
Les mots étrangers sont automatiquement traduits dans la langue de votre choix.

Dictionnaires pris en charge:
- Anglais
- Français
- Allemand
- Espagnol

Exegetical Dictionary fonctionne sur tous les sites Web, il est plus rapide, plus facile et plus léger que les concurrents, comme le dictionnaire Google.

REMARQUES:

1. Après l'installation, les pages déjà ouvertes ne fonctionneront pas pour la recherche - il suffit de les actualiser et cela sera résolu.
2. Les pages de la galerie d'extensions Chrome n'autorisent pas la recherche (ni aucune extension sur la page) pour des raisons de sécurité.
3. Cette extension ajoute une icône de barre d'outils. N'oubliez pas de l'épingler.

long.id,ms:
Welcome To Exegetical Dictionary page!

This extension that allows you to quickly look up definitions of words and phrases in a clean inline box. 

Hold a modifier key (Alt on Windows, Command on Mac, Ctrl on Linux) and double-click or select any word to look it up - an inline box will open to the dictionary entry of that word, usually including examples, audio pronunciation and synonyms.

Exegetical Dictionary is absolutely free chrome extension with a necessary permission range.

Among all features you'll get:
1) Double-click any word to view its definition in a small pop-up bubble.
2) View the complete definition of any word or phrase using the toolbar dictionary.
3) Store a history of words you've looked up, so you can practice them later.
Foreign words are automatically translated to your language of choice.


Supported dictionaries:
- English
- French
- German
- Spanish


NOTES:

1. After installing, pages already open will not work for looking up - just refresh them and it'll be solved.
2. The Chrome Extensions Gallery pages don't allow lookup (or any on-page extensions) for security reasons.
3. This extension does add a toolbar icon. Do not forget to Pin it.

IMPORTANT:
- The pop-up bubble will not work in tabs that were open prior to installation. After installing this extension, either reload your open tabs or restart Chrome.
- Note that all extensions are disabled on Chrome Web Store pages (including this one). Do not test the extension on this page; it will not work!
- If the extension is not working for you, please make sure it's up to date. Visit chrome://extensions/, click the "Update extensions now" button, then restart Chrome.
----------
With this extension, you can:
1) Double-click any word to view its definition in a small pop-up bubble.
2) View the complete definition of any word or phrase using the toolbar dictionary.
3) Store a history of words you've looked up, so you can practice them later.
Foreign words are automatically translated to your language of choice.
Supported dictionaries:
- Arabic
- Brazilian Portuguese
- Chinese (Simplified)
- Chinese (Traditional)
- Czech
- Dutch
- English (UK)
- English (US)
- French
- German
- Hindi
- Italian
- Japanese
- Korean
- Russian
- Slovak
- Spanish
- Turkish
If you opt in (via the options page), this extension will store a history of all your looked-up words and their definitions. You can download this history as a CSV file at any time. In addition, you can allow other Chrome extensions to access this history. For example, a third-party extension could produce flashcards to help you practice words you've looked up before.
long.it:
Benvenuti nella pagina del dizionario esegetico!

Ognuno di noi non riusciva a ricordare il significato di tutte le parole, l'app Dictionary fatta per continuare a risolvere questo problema.
L'estensione del dizionario consente di cercare rapidamente le definizioni di parole e frasi in una casella in linea pulita. Il dizionario mostra una breve descrizione della parola in un popup, viene fornito anche un pulsante per una descrizione completa tramite Google Dictionary (di Google)

Utilizzo di un dizionario simile a Google Dictionary (di Google) Tieni premuto un tasto modificatore (Alt su Windows, Comando su Mac, Ctrl su Linux) e fai doppio clic o seleziona una parola per cercarla: una casella in linea si aprirà alla voce del dizionario di quella parola, che di solito include esempi, pronuncia audio e sinonimi.

La nostra estensione del dizionario è un addon di Chrome assolutamente gratuito. L'estensione del dizionario richiede solo l'intervallo di autorizzazioni necessario per un lavoro corretto.

Tra tutte le funzionalità otterrai:
1) Fare doppio clic su una parola per visualizzarne la definizione in un piccolo fumetto a comparsa.
2) Visualizza la definizione completa di qualsiasi parola o frase utilizzando il dizionario della barra degli strumenti.
3) Memorizza una cronologia delle parole che hai cercato, in modo da poterle praticare in seguito.
Le parole straniere vengono tradotte automaticamente nella lingua prescelta.

Dizionari supportati:
- Inglese
- Francese
- Tedesco
- Spagnolo

Il dizionario esegetico funziona su tutti i siti web, è più veloce, più facile e più leggero dei concorrenti, come il dizionario di google.

APPUNTI:

1. Dopo l'installazione, le pagine già aperte non funzioneranno per la ricerca: basta aggiornarle e sarà risolto.
2. Le pagine della Galleria delle estensioni di Chrome non consentono la ricerca (o eventuali estensioni sulla pagina) per motivi di sicurezza.
3. Questa estensione aggiunge un'icona della barra degli strumenti. Non dimenticare di appuntarlo.

Welcome To the Exegetical Dictionary page!

Any of us couldn't remember the meaning of all words, Dictionary app made to stay on a way solving this problem. 
Dictionary extension allows you to quickly lookup definitions of words and phrases in a clean inline box. Dictionary shows a short description of the word in a popup, button is also provided for comprehensive description via Google Dictionary (by Google)

Using Dictionary similar to Google Dictionary (by Google )Hold a modifier key (Alt on Windows, Command on Mac, Ctrl on Linux) and double-click or select any word to look it up - an inline box will open to the dictionary entry of that word, usually including examples, audio pronunciation, and synonyms.

Our Dictionary extension is an absolutely free chrome addon. Dictionary extension requires only the necessary permission range for proper work.

Among all features you'll get:
1) Double-click any word to view its definition in a small pop-up bubble.
2) View the complete definition of any word or phrase using the toolbar dictionary.
3) Store a history of words you've looked up, so you can practice them later.
Foreign words are automatically translated to your language of choice.

Supported dictionaries:
- English
- French
- German
- Spanish

Exegetical Dictionary works on all websites, it is faster easier, and lighter than competitors, like google dictionary.

NOTES:

1. After installing, pages already open will not work for looking up - just refresh them and it'll be solved.
2. The Chrome Extensions Gallery pages don't allow lookup (or any on-page extensions) for security reasons.
3. This extension does add a toolbar icon. Do not forget to Pin it.

Just like a real-life mate has your back, Mate Translate Extension for Chrome has you covered for all your translation needs.
Mate helps you easily and effortlessly translate words, phrases and documents from 103 languages.
Mate’s comprehensive dictionary and custom curated phrasebook will help you accelerate your language learning with both page translation and optional human translation.
Mate isn’t just for reading and writing but for full language mastery and comprehension. Download your Mate Chrome translator today and never feel lost in language again.
Reading an article on the Internet and don’t know a word? Just select any text on any webpage, press a shortcut and see the translation in an unobtrusive window right on the same page.
Need to type in some text by yourself and translate it? Just open the Mate pop-up window by clicking on the icon next to your browser address bar. It’s always by your side!
103 languages
It understands 103 languages. Mate also teaches you how to pronounce correctly. It shows phonetic transcription, transliteration and can speak out words and texts with correct accent.
Full-page translation
Mate can translate entire web pages within one mouse-click! Just select "Translate this page" in the context menu on any page to see it translated to your language.
Synchronization
It synchronizes across all your devices. All your translation & dictionary data will be automatically synchronized between all your browsers, iPhones and Macs you are using Mate on.
Phrasebook

It allows you to create custom word lists with your favorite words. Just give our Mate Phrasebook a try. Easily create & curate word lists which are available even offline. Perfect for language learners or travelers who need to have their word lists always by their side.
Download Mate today to get your ultimate translation helper for free! 550,000 users worldwide are already using Mate.

Dictionary extension allows you to quickly lookup definitions of words and phrases in a clean inline box. Dictionary shows a short description of the word in a popup, button is also provided for comprehensive description via Google Dictionary (by Google)

Using Dictionary similar to Google Dictionary (by Google )Hold a modifier key (Alt on Windows, Command on Mac, Ctrl on Linux) and double-click or select any word to look it up - an inline box will open to the dictionary entry of that word, usually including examples, audio pronunciation, and synonyms.

Our Dictionary extension is an absolutely free chrome addon. Dictionary extension requires only the necessary permission range for proper work.

Among all features you'll get:
1) Double-click any word to view its definition in a small pop-up bubble.

- English
- French
- German
- Spanish

Exegetical Dictionary works on all websites, it is faster easier, and lighter than competitors, like google dictionary.

NOTES:

1. After installing, pages already open will not work for looking up - just refresh them and it'll be solved.
2. The Chrome Extensions Gallery pages don't allow lookup (or any on-page extensions) for security reasons.
3. This extension does add a toolbar icon. Do not forget to Pin it.
Smart Translate FEATURES:
✅ Translation between over 100 languages.
✅ Words translation with Dictionary.
✅ Text-to-voice in 30 languages.
✅ Automatic language detection.
✅ Translation languages customization.
✅ Localization of the user interface.
✅ Words translation using the built-in dictionary.
✅ Translation history.
✅ Supports Double-click translation, Shortcut and Mouse Selection translation.

NOTE: Currently only English Dictionary and English Wikipedia are supported.
With this extension, you can:
1) Double-click any word to view its instant definition in a small pop-up bubble.
2) Lookup the complete definition of words or phrases using the toolbar dictionary.
3) Perform lookup for detailed definitions in online dictionary.
4) One click access to Google search if the word/phrase is not found in dictionary.
5) More advanced than Google Dictionary.
6) Works with Google Docs and Microsoft Office 365

long.nl:
Welkom op de Exegetical Dictionary-pagina!

Ieder van ons kon zich de betekenis van alle woorden niet herinneren, de Dictionary-app gemaakt om dit probleem op te lossen.
Met de woordenboekuitbreiding kunt u snel definities van woorden en woordgroepen opzoeken in een schoon inline vak. Woordenboek toont een korte beschrijving van het woord in een pop-up, knop is ook voorzien voor uitgebreide beschrijving via Google Dictionary (door Google)

Woordenboek gebruiken vergelijkbaar met Google Dictionary (door Google) Houd een modificatietoets ingedrukt (Alt op Windows, Command op Mac, Ctrl op Linux) en dubbelklik of selecteer een woord om het op te zoeken - een inline vak wordt geopend voor het woordenboekitem van dat woord, meestal inclusief voorbeelden, audio-uitspraak en synoniemen.

Onze Dictionary-extensie is een absoluut gratis Chrome-add-on. Woordenboekuitbreiding vereist alleen het benodigde machtigingsbereik voor correct werk.

Van alle functies krijg je:
1) Dubbelklik op een woord om de definitie ervan in een kleine pop-upballon te zien.
2) Bekijk de volledige definitie van een woord of zin met behulp van het werkbalkwoordenboek.
3) Bewaar een geschiedenis van woorden die je hebt opgezocht, zodat je ze later kunt oefenen.
Vreemde woorden worden automatisch vertaald naar de taal van uw keuze.

Ondersteunde woordenboeken:
- Engels
- Frans
- Duitse
- Spaans

Exegetical Dictionary werkt op alle websites, het is sneller, gemakkelijker en lichter dan concurrenten, zoals Google Dictionary.

OPMERKINGEN:

1. Na het installeren werken reeds geopende pagina's niet om ze op te zoeken. Vernieuw ze gewoon en het probleem is opgelost.
2. De Chrome Extensions Gallery-pagina's staan ​​opzoeken (of enige extensies op de pagina) om veiligheidsredenen niet toe.
3. Deze extensie voegt een werkbalkpictogram toe. Vergeet het niet te pinnen.
long.pl:
Witamy na stronie Słownika Egzegetycznego!

Nikt z nas nie mógł sobie przypomnieć znaczenia wszystkich słów, aplikacja Dictionary została stworzona, aby pozostać na drodze do rozwiązania tego problemu.
Rozszerzenie słownika umożliwia szybkie wyszukiwanie definicji słów i fraz w przejrzystym polu w wierszu. Słownik pokazuje krótki opis słowa w wyskakującym okienku, przycisk jest również dostępny do pełnego opisu za pośrednictwem Słownika Google (od Google)

Korzystanie ze słownika podobnego do słownika Google (od Google) Przytrzymaj klawisz modyfikujący (Alt w Windows, Command na Macu, Ctrl w Linuksie) i kliknij dwukrotnie lub wybierz dowolne słowo, aby je wyszukać - otworzy się pole wbudowane do wpisu słownika to słowo, zwykle zawierające przykłady, wymowę audio i synonimy.

Nasze rozszerzenie Dictionary to całkowicie darmowy dodatek do Chrome. Rozszerzenie słownika wymaga jedynie niezbędnego zakresu uprawnień do poprawnej pracy.

Wśród wszystkich funkcji, które otrzymasz:
1) Kliknij dwukrotnie dowolne słowo, aby wyświetlić jego definicję w małym wyskakującym okienku.
2) Wyświetl pełną definicję dowolnego słowa lub frazy, korzystając ze słownika paska narzędzi.
3) Przechowuj historię wyszukiwanych słów, aby móc je później przećwiczyć.
Obce słowa są automatycznie tłumaczone na wybrany język.

Obsługiwane słowniki:
- Język angielski
- Francuski
- Niemiecki
- Hiszpański

Słownik egzegetyczny działa na wszystkich stronach internetowych, jest szybszy, łatwiejszy i lżejszy niż konkurencja, np. Słownik Google.

UWAGI:

1. Po zainstalowaniu strony już otwarte nie będą działać w celu wyszukania - wystarczy je odświeżyć i problem zostanie rozwiązany.
2. Strony Galerii rozszerzeń Chrome nie pozwalają na wyszukiwanie (ani na żadne rozszerzenia na stronie) ze względów bezpieczeństwa.
3. To rozszerzenie dodaje ikonę paska narzędzi. Nie zapomnij go przypiąć.


Welcome To the Exegetical Dictionary page!

Any of us couldn't remember the meaning of all words. Google Dictionary app made to resolve this problem. 
Dictionary extension allows you to quickly lookup definitions of words and phrases in a clean inline box. Dictionary shows a short description of the word in a popup, button is also provided for comprehensive description via Google Dictionary (by Google)

It is not A Google Translator, imTranslator, Select to Translate or others, it is a convenient extension to learn new words.

Using Dictionary similar to Google Dictionary (by Google )Hold a modifier key (Alt on Windows, Command on Mac, Ctrl on Linux) and double-click or select any word to look it up - an inline box will open to the dictionary entry of that word, usually including examples, audio pronunciation, and synonyms.

Our Dictionary extension is an absolutely free chrome addon. Dictionary extension requires only the necessary permission range for proper work.

Among all features you'll get:
1) Double-click any word to view its definition in a small pop-up bubble.
2) View the complete definition of any word or phrase using the toolbar dictionary.
3) Store a history of words you've looked up, so you can practice them later.
Foreign words are automatically translated to your language of choice.

Supported dictionaries:
- English
- French
- German
- Spanish

Exegetical Dictionary works on all websites, it is faster easier, and lighter than competitors, like google dictionary.

NOTES:

1. After installing, pages already open will not work for looking up - just refresh them and it'll be solved.
2. The Chrome Extensions Gallery pages don't allow lookup (or any on-page extensions) for security reasons.
3. This extension does add a toolbar icon. Do not forget to Pin it.
long.ru:
Добро пожаловать на страницу Экзегетического словаря!

Это расширение, которое позволяет быстро находить определения слов и фраз в чистом встроенном поле.

Удерживая клавишу-модификатор (Alt в Windows, Command в Mac, Ctrl в Linux), дважды щелкните или выберите любое слово, чтобы найти его - откроется встроенное поле для словарной статьи этого слова, обычно включающей примеры, звуковое произношение и синонимы.

Exegetical Dictionary - это абсолютно бесплатное расширение для Chrome с необходимым диапазоном разрешений.

Среди всех функций вы получите:
1) Дважды щелкните любое слово, чтобы просмотреть его определение в небольшом всплывающем пузыре.
2) Просмотрите полное определение любого слова или фразы, используя словарь панели инструментов.
3) Сохраните историю слов, которые вы искали, чтобы вы могли практиковать их позже.
Иностранные слова автоматически переводятся на выбранный вами язык.


Поддерживаемые словари:
- Английский
- Французский язык
- Немецкий
- Испанский язык


Важно:

1. После установки уже открытые страницы не будут работать для поиска - просто обновите их, и проблема будет решена.
2. На страницах галереи расширений Chrome не разрешен поиск (или любые расширения на странице) по соображениям безопасности.
3. Это расширение добавляет значок на панель инструментов. Не забудьте закрепить.

3. This extension does add a toolbar icon. Do not forget to Pin it.
